scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:bundle:copy && yarn build:component
scripts.build:bundle:copy: yarn workspace @matterport/bundle build && yarn workspace @matterport/bundle dist:copy $(pwd)/built-bundle
scripts.build:bundle:link: yarn workspace @matterport/bundle build && yarn workspace @matterport/webcomponent bundle:link
scripts.dev:vite: yarn dev:bundle:link-if-needed && yarn dev:component && yarn workspace @matterport/webcomponent-demo-vite dev
scripts.dev:webpack: yarn dev:bundle:link-if-needed && yarn dev:component && yarn workspace @matterport/webcomponent-demo-webpack dev
scripts.prepare-public: yarn workspace @matterport/bundle dist:copy $(pwd)/built-bundle && cp ./built-bundle/LICENSE.md ./LICENSE.md && yarn replace-mp
scripts.publish-build: yarn build && yarn exec package-needs-publish $npm_package_name && COMMIT=false CHANGELOG=false yarn exec package-publish $npm_package_name rc
